trends: There have been 105 other sightings in Tampa
There was one other sighting in Tampa on or around November 18th 2008
divs: sighting detailsit was between 9:20 and 9:25 pm. i let the dog outside. i stood in the backyard waiting for the dog. i noticed an extremely bright orb suddenly appear in the sky. it was very bright orange\yellow color. kinda reminded me of a flashlight being turned on in complete darkness. it was just suddenly there. i guess it was somewhere in the sky over land o lakes or wesley chapel. in between the two cities i guess. often see planes flying to tampa intl. to land but this light had to be around ten times bigger many, mnay times more bright than a plane approaching for a landing. this is the fourth or fifth time i've seen objects and lights in the sky since march 2008. i really think there must be something going on in the area or something attacts this activity. the sighting was no longer than two seconds. and then the light just vanished.
